name: Fantasy Chess (Wolfie)
description:
A free form chess style turn based board game set in a fantasy medieval world, is this what chess would be like in this world.

Features rock, paper, scissors style combat in a turn based manner, each match is different with randomly rolled match modifiers, the combat deepens with certain status effects.

this is one of my very first solo built games, so i understand it's nothing special but i do hope it is enjoyable.
